channel.title: Help?
channel.description: Okay, So I've been wanting to make my own server for a long time. LONG time. But it has always seemed to hard :L So I just decided to try it. I already make a no-ip.org and did the port forwarding and etc. I downloaded the DeltaScape source but I can't seem to find any guides on how to deal with this now? From what I've seen you need to code things. Okay -.-" Well I dont have time to learn how to code. So now I have a file with ALL these things in it and I dont know what to do....... So can someone tell me what to do from this? If there is a guide on it already then please give me the link :) Sorry for my stupidity but you have to learn somehow, Or just get someone to walk you through it all just to get it done.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

First open up client.java and search for “welcome to deltascape” you will find something like this.

sM("Welcome to Deltascape.");

Change the deltascape part to your server name also you can add another message by doing this say if you wanted this welcome message.
Welcome To YOURSERVERNAME
Please Don’t Ask For Staff I’m Sick and tired of it!
The Code will be

sM("Welcome To YOURSERVERNAME."); sM("Please Don't Ask For Staff I'm Sick And Tired Of It!");
Starting To understand a bit now? ;D
THEY MUST BE INLINE!

Read full topic
